name: Western 1849 Reloaded
description: Become the ultimate Bounty Hunter in this bullet-fast, third-person Shooting Gallery and save the town of Sunset Bluff from the relentless Quicksilver Guns!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP (SP3) / Vista™ (SP1) / 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 or Radeon equivalent Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
